1. Artificial Intelligence Is Coming for Venture Firms  Business Insider
  2. AI has reduced the barriers to bootstrapping - will VCs now get the boot?  Maddyness
  3. AI, venture capital, and the next big opportunity in tech, with 'Startup Project' host Nataraj Sindam  GeekWire
  4. Venture capital faces threats from multiple fronts  Business Insider

item.title: SoftBank CEO says AI that is 10,000 times smarter than humans will come out in 10 years - CNBC
item.description:
